recipe.title: Home made crackers
recipe.ingredient: 1 cup mix sun flower, pepita and pine nuts
recipe.step: Prepare two trays by covering them with baking paper, then set aside.
Mix all seeds and husks in a bowl, with salt.
Pour in water and mix well.
Cover and rest on bench for 15 minutes.
Divide between trays and push down with wet hands until 3-4mm thick.
Cook for approximately 1 hour, turning trays around after 30 minutes.
Once cool break up and serve with your favourite topping.
